mainText:
You are the Thomas Edison, the Leonardo Da Vinci and the Aristotle of 
our time. Since I have been alive I've used apple products. It's for me 
to even rap my mind around these events that just transpired. Rest in 
peace Steve Jobs the legacy you have left is unbelievable, and in my 
mind you will never be dead. My prayers go out to your family, and 
everyone battling the awful disease of cancer. Rest in peace Steve Jobs.
author: Daniel
